label: Weapon_Shield_006_Desc
text: This Boko shield is reinforced with fossilized bone. Its defensive capabilities are respectable, but its predictably slipshod craftsmanship spells low durability.

label: Weapon_Shield_007_Name
text: Lizal Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_037_Desc
text: This shield was cherished by the Gerudo Champion Urbosa. The gold used to make it was handpicked to ensure a design that is both lightweight and very durable.

label: Weapon_Shield_038_Name
text: Ancient Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_016_Desc
text: A sturdy shield favored by Lynels for its defensive and offensive capabilities. First and foremost a shield, but the bladed edges can deal slashing attacks when deflecting.

label: Weapon_Shield_017_Name
text: Mighty Lynel Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_026_Desc
text: The design of this metal shield has changed over time to match the Gerudo's sword-and- shield fighting style. It's favored by soldiers and travelers alike.

label: Weapon_Shield_030_Name
text: Hylian Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_037_Name
text: Daybreaker

label: Weapon_Shield_057_Desc
text: A shield said to have been the favorite of a hero who traveled the open seas. It was apparently a family heirloom, passed down through many generations.

label: Weapon_Shield_040_Name
text: Pot Lid

label: Weapon_Shield_002_Desc
text: A shield once used by the guards of Hyrule Castle. It's easy to handle, but its core is  made of wood, so it can catch fire.

label: Weapon_Shield_003_Name
text: Knight's Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_009_Desc
text: This Lizal shield is adorned with several metal shells as a means of reinforcement. Its defensive capabilities are high, but its weight requires a skilled soldier to bear.

label: Weapon_Shield_013_Name
text: Guardian Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_002_Name
text: Soldier’s Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_022_Desc
text: A shield issued to the Hyrulean royal family's immediate guard detail. It boasts a high defense, but these days it's more a collector's item due to its ornamentation.

label: Weapon_Shield_023_Name
text: Forest Dweller's Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_032_Desc
text: Often carried by fishermen for its fish design, which represents hope for a great catch. Its light wooden construction makes it convenient to take onto a boat.

label: Weapon_Shield_033_Name
text: Royal Guard's Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_042_Desc
text: Rito warriors cherish this shield. Its unique shape is designed with mid-battle flight in mind to facilitate aerial combat.

label: Weapon_Shield_005_Desc
text: A Boko shield made of slightly stronger wood and reinforced with animal bones.

label: Weapon_Shield_006_Name
text: Dragonbone Boko Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_036_Desc
text: This extravagant shield is presented to Gerudo warriors who rise to the rank of captain. Its apparent opulence is rivaled only by its combat capabilities.

label: Weapon_Shield_015_Desc
text: The output level of this shield has been boosted to maximum. Its combat capabilities surpass those of metallic shields, and it can deflect Guardian Scout beams.

label: Weapon_Shield_016_Name
text: Lynel Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_025_Desc
text: A Zora-made shield adorned with intricate ornamentation. It's said that true masters of this shield can redirect attacks as a rock redirects rushing water.

label: Weapon_Shield_026_Name
text: Gerudo Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_036_Name
text: Radiant Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_057_Name
text: Hero's Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_001_Desc
text: This lightweight, simple shield is ideal for less-experienced fighters. It can withstand light attacks, but blocking stronger blows is not recommended.

label: Weapon_Shield_037_PictureBook
text: This shield was cherished by the Gerudo Champion Urbosa. The gold used to make it was handpicked to ensure a design that is both lightweight and very durable.

label: Weapon_Shield_008_Desc
text: This Lizal shield has been strengthened by adding a different type of metal to the mix. The edge is lined with spikes, so handle with care.

label: Weapon_Shield_009_Name
text: Steel Lizal Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_018_PictureBook
text: This ultimate Lynel shield is used only by the white-haired Lynels. It excels at defending against even the most brutal of attacks and cutting down powerful foes when deflecting.

label: Weapon_Shield_018_Desc
text: This ultimate Lynel shield is used only by the white-haired Lynels. It excels at defending against even the most brutal of attacks and cutting down powerful foes when deflecting.

label: Weapon_Shield_001_Name
text: Wooden Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_022_Name
text: Royal Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_038_PictureBook
text: This shield was made using ancient Sheikah technology. Its surface glows blue when raised in defense. Enhanced functionality allows it to deflect Guardian beams.

label: Weapon_Shield_021_Desc
text: It's likely this rusty old shield once belonged to a knight. It still has some defensive capabilities, but its usefulness has been worn down by time.

label: Weapon_Shield_008_PictureBook
text: This Lizal shield has been strengthened by adding a different type of metal to the mix. The edge is lined with spikes, so handle with care.

label: Weapon_Shield_031_Desc
text: Favored by hunters for its rabbit design, which is said to bring luck on hunts. It's easy to use, but its durability leaves something to be desired.

label: Weapon_Shield_032_Name
text: Fisherman's Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_035_PictureBook
text: A sturdy shield loved by many an adventurer. It is made of animal hide and sturdy wood and is best suited to defending against weak monsters or animals.

label: Weapon_Shield_016_PictureBook
text: A sturdy shield favored by Lynels for its defensive and offensive capabilities. First and foremost a shield, but the bladed edges can deal slashing attacks when deflecting.

label: Weapon_Shield_042_Name
text: Kite Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_041_Desc
text: A small Sheikah-made shield. Its design is intended to decrease blind spots without sacrificing too much defense.

label: Weapon_Shield_004_Desc
text: A Bokoblin-made shield created by attaching a handhold to any flat tree bark picked up off the ground. It's pretty shoddy, so don't expect it to last very long.

label: Weapon_Shield_005_Name
text: Spiked Boko Shield

label: Weapon_Shield_009_PictureBook
text: This Lizal shield is adorned with several metal shells as a means of reinforcement. Its defensive capabilities are high, but its weight requires a skilled soldier to bear.

label: Weapon_Shield_036_PictureBook
text: This extravagant shield is presented to Gerudo warriors who rise to the rank of captain. Its apparent opulence is rivaled only by its combat capabilities.

label: Weapon_Shield_017_PictureBook
text: This Lynel-made shield has been reinforced with armor and even more blades. Stronger in both defense and offense, it can tear through basic armor when deflecting.

label: Weapon_Shield_035_Desc
text: A sturdy shield loved by many an adventurer. It is made of animal hide and sturdy wood and is best suited to defending against weak monsters or animals.
